sentences.cn: 沙漠地区是草木不生的.

sentences.en: My mind was arid, all inspiration gone.
No crops will grow in arid soil.
sentences.cn: 任何农作物都不能在干涸的土壤中生长.

sentences.en: Nothing grows in these arid conditions.
sentences.cn: 在这些乾旱环境中,寸草不生.

sentences.en: She had given him the only joy his arid life had ever known.
sentences.cn: 她为他枯燥无味的生活带来了从未有过的乐趣。

sentences.en: Terpenoids are more prevalent in some arid or semiarid climates.
sentences.cn: 萜类在某些干旱或半干旱气候条件下较为普遍.

sentences.en: The audience soon grew tired of his arid speech.
sentences.cn: 没多久听众对他枯燥无味的演说就感到厌腻了.

sentences.en: The broom grows down the arid sandhill.
sentences.cn: 金雀草蔓延在干燥的沙丘下.

sentences.en: The region is semiarid to arid in overall climate.
sentences.cn: 这个地区总体上是半干旱至干旱气候.

sentences.en: There are serious problems of land degradation in some arid zones.
sentences.cn: 在一些干旱地带存在严重的土地退化问题。

sentences.en: These plants will not root in such arid soil.
sentences.cn: 这种植物在这种贫瘠的土地上不会生根.

sentences.en: These trees will shield off arid winds and protect the fields.
sentences.cn: 这些树能挡住旱风,保护农田.

sentences.en: They all talk with the same depressing harsh arid tongue.
sentences.cn: 说起话来都是一样干巴,一样的生硬,叫人听得好扫兴.

sentences.en: Twenty million years ago, Idaho was not the arid place it is now. Rather, it was warm and damp, populated by dense primordial forest.
sentences.cn: 2,000万年前，爱达荷州并不像现在这样干旱。相反，那时的爱达荷州温暖潮湿，有大片的原始森林。

sentences.en: Water from the Great Lakes is pumped to arid regions .
sentences.cn: 五大湖中的水被输往干旱地区。

phrases.tran_cn: 干旱区域，干旱地区；干燥区

trans.tran_cn: 干旱的，干燥的，贫瘠的，荒芜的，不毛的，枯燥无味的，无趣的
trans.tran_en: arid land or an arid  climate  is very dry because it has very little rain
